name: Flow Show
description:
Flow Show is a simple plugin for those that need to present different connector flows in a FigJam file (or Figma file that contains connectors). With Flow Show, you canâ€¦


  • Show or hide all unlocked connector arrows
  • Assign selected connectors to one of three flows
  • Filter the visibility of connector arrows by flow


Flow Show does not change the visibility of locked connectors, so you can use Flow Show to switch between up to 3 different flow options from a single locked connector flow.


I made this plugin to be super simple so that I could easily toggle between connector flows during design reviews and presentations in Figma and FigJam. Happy to get feedback on how to make Flow Show even better.
